comment: First time on Gab. Found it cause I just got another day Twitter time out for calling Andrea Mitchell a bimbo. They suspended me for hate speech within about seconds of the tweet.
amr:
# ::snt First time on Gab. Found it cause I just got another day Twitter time out for calling Andrea Mitchell a bimbo. They suspended me for hate speech within about seconds of the tweet.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / time
            :ord (o / ordinal-entity
                  :value 1)
            :time-of (p / publication
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Gab")))
      :snt2 (f / find-01
            :ARG1 (ii / it)
            :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (g / get-01
                        :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                        :ARG1 (t2 / time
                              :mod (p2 / publication
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Twitter"))
                              :mod (a / another)
                              :duration (t3 / temporal-quantity
                                    :quant 1
                                    :unit (d / day)))
                        :ARG1-of c
                        :ARG0 (c2 / call-01
                              :ARG0 ii2
                              :ARG1 (p3 / person
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "Andrea"
                                          :op2 "Mitchell"))
                              :ARG2 (b / bimbo)))
                  :mod (j / just)))
      :snt3 (s / suspend-01
            :ARG0 (t4 / they)
            :ARG1 ii2
            :ARG2 (s2 / speak-01
                  :ARG1 (h / hate-01))
            :time (a2 / after
                  :op1 (t5 / tweet-01)
                  :quant (u / up-to
                        :op1 (t6 / temporal-quantity
                              :quant 1
                              :unit (s3 / second))))))

comment: Using the words 'cunt or bimbo' is offensive as its a direct attack to someone based on their gender. Avoid such words.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (o / offend-01
            :ARG0 (u / use-01
                  :ARG1 (w / word
                        :ARG1-of (m2 / mean-01
                              :ARG2 (o2 / or
                                    :op1 (c / cunt)
                                    :op2 (b / bimbo)))))
            :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (a / attack-01

                              :ARG1-of (b2 / base-02
                                    :ARG2 (g / gender
                                          :poss s)))
                        :ARG1-of (d / direct-02))))
      :snt2 (a2 / avoid-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (w2 / word
                  :mod (s2 / such))))
